hours_text:
## [ Programs at the Museum](https://www.brickstoremuseum.org/calendar)

##### [_Offerings for children and adults_](https://www.brickstoremuseum.org/calendar)

### **Welcome to the Brick Store Museum. We tell the story of Kennebunk.**

The Brick Store Museum illustrates local history, art and cultures in Kennebunk and its surrounding communities in five historic buildings on Main Street.

Here, you will explore programs, exhibitions, and initiatives to ignite personal connections to stories across time and space.

[ Plan Your Visit ](https://www.brickstoremuseum.org/visit/)

[ Program Calendar ](https://www.brickstoremuseum.org/calendar)

[ About the Museum ](https://brickstoremuseum.org/about/)

admission_text:
# Visit

Plan your visit to the Brick Store Museum

The Brick Store Museum is open year round with rotating [Exhibitions](https://brickstoremuseum.org/exhibitions) and a full [Calendar](https://brickstoremuseum.org/calendar) of programs and events. Plan your visit to downtown Kennebunk where you can explore seven galleries in our five historic buildings, watch demonstrations, enjoy gardens, take part in [walking tours](https://www.brickstoremuseum.org/toursandtalks/) and [programs](https://www.brickstoremuseum.org/museumschool/), all while at the heart of Kennebunk’s Historic District and footsteps from [Downtown Kennebunk](https://downtownkennebunk.com/)‘s shopping and dining district.

### Hours of Operation

**Tuesday – Friday:** 10:00am – 5:00pm

**Saturday:** 10:00am – 4:00pm

**Sunday:** 12:00pm – 4:00pm

+++

_Special Hours & Events can be found on our [Calendar](https://www.brickstoremuseum.org/calendar/)_

### Museum Admission

**Adult:** $5.00

**Child (ages 10 – 16):** $2.00

**Child (under 10):** Free

**Members:** Free – [_Learn More!_](https://www.brickstoremuseum.org/membership/)

_See more about Rates and Discounts below_

### Directions

117 Main Street, Kennebunk, ME 04043

### Free & Reduced Admission Programs

Not only does Museum Membership offer free admission every day, but it supports the Museum’s work and ensures we remain open for everyone into the future. 

[Join today!](https://www.brickstoremuseum.org/membership/)

The Museum offers FREE ADMISSION...
